# [FEAT] Two-Factor Authentication

## Labels
`security`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for enhanced account security.

## Requirements

### 2FA Methods
- TOTP (authenticator apps)
- SMS codes
- Email codes
- Hardware keys (U2F/FIDO2)
- Backup codes

### 2FA Configuration
- Enable/disable 2FA
- Required for all users
- Required for admins only
- Grace period
- Trusted devices

### Authenticator Apps
- Google Authenticator
- Authy
- Microsoft Authenticator
- 1Password
- QR code setup

### Recovery
- Backup codes generation
- Recovery email
- Admin reset capability
- Account recovery flow
- Security questions

### User Experience
- Setup wizard
- Remember device option
- Clear instructions
- Fallback methods
- Session management

### Enforcement
- Role-based requirements
- Compliance enforcement
- New user enforcement
- Grace period for setup
- Bypass rules (emergency)

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports two-factor authentication for enhanced security.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] TOTP 2FA works
- [ ] Multiple methods available
- [ ] Backup codes functional
- [ ] Recovery process works
- [ ] Enforcement configurable
